website_summaries.verdict: The LBLA drone incorporates many of the exciting features seen in other models for far less, making it a good option for kids, families, and first-time-fliers.
pros: Stream live video and take pictures from your smartphone via Wi-Fi
Altitude Hold button makes the drone hover in place
cons: An all-around fine drone, but its 480p HD camera could be much better

customer_reviews.title: Good drone
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his drone! He flies it all the time! The only drawback that we didn't know about was that it only will hold a charge and fly for about 5 minutes before you have to charge the battery again. I am looking into buying multiple batteries for him so he can fly it for a longer period of time. The only other thing is that it's supposed to flip mid-air, and it did for about a week, then it quit. Now it just flies, and that's fine, but it was supposed to flip.
customer_reviews.author: Ronda

customer_reviews.title: Great Introductory Drone
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd Drone in one year. It was gift for 10 year old. He loved it. Since he had never used it before, for him it was good introductory drone. This drone comes in good packaging, It is easy to assemble. Material quality is also good. Instructions are clear. It operates very well. Pic quality is also fine not great. We did not try video but i would expect it to be same quality. Battery life is low. Thats the only problem. Otherwise this drone is good for first timers.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: This is a good entry level drone for outdoors,
customer_reviews.text: This is a good entry level drone for outdoors, Relatively easy control once after your first 10minutes of learning. It also came with spare parts so that's good if I need them. Battery was quick to charge but I wish it was better protected in a housing. Otherwise, if you're looking for your first drone this is not a bad choice.
customer_reviews.author: Big Bear

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to use
customer_reviews.text: On opening the box, it was obvious the materials were pretty cheap. The top of the compartment for the battery barely stayed shut after opening it once or twice. But the biggest problem was having little control over the drone during flight. Even after practising a couple hours, the controls are VERY difficult to handle as most of the time the drone does not follow the directions. We ended up losing our drone after flying it with almost a full battery about 20 ft high, it lost connection with the remote and started flying upwards and so far away from the remote that we still have not recovered it.
customer_reviews.author: Karl Miller

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 3 weeks
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my son as a "starter drone". It was pretty easy to assemble. He had it for about 3 weeks when one of the propellers stopped working. I tried to get ahold of the company to see if they could help but received no response. Thankfully Amazon let me return it. It was fun while it lasted but I found it to be cheaply-made. The fly time was never more than 5 to 8 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: MONKEYMOM

customer_reviews.title: Finally! An affordable drone!!
customer_reviews.text: Ok, I've been working in video for a few years now. I don't run the cameras, but I have ALWAYS wanted to get a drone just for my own fun. Sadly, most of the quality ones are out of my price range. This one is at a great price point! It's not 1080, but the quality is still quite good. It's a great opportunity to try out a drone at a really good price. Signal connection is good, too. Now, if the wife will just let me keep it!!
customer_reviews.author: Steph99

customer_reviews.title: Pretty great!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first drone that I have ever purchased and I was able to get the hang of it pretty quick! It’s especially great for beginners, given the functionality and low price point compared to other brands out there. We have pretty strong winds in Texas and I was a little worried about the weight of the drone when it arrived because it was so light but it does very well outside and doesn’t get affected by the wind so much. My only suggestion/complaint would be a thicker plastic or material for the landing gear but that’s about it. If you are wanting to learn how to fly a drone, I recommend starting with something like this.
customer_reviews.author: Avilla

customer_reviews.title: Fun to fly outdoors, the phone app is a nice touch
customer_reviews.text: Lots of great features here! I love that this drone has a home button, because it’s much better for flying outside and you’re going to want to call it back when you’re nearing a tree or power line. I got a little cocky after my smaller drone purchase, and wanted something larger... this one is a larger drone at a price point that’s still good for beginners. It took me several tries to get it not to pull to one side, but once I did, it was a lot of fun to fly. I would recommend this for somebody who is ready to get a larger drone, but not quite ready for a professional-grade model.
customer_reviews.author: MyBunnyGoBoom

customer_reviews.title: Best Flown with 2.4 TX
customer_reviews.text: This is an entry level brushed quadcopter. This is an RTF package, just supply the required batteries for the TX. Flight with the included 2.4GHz TX is as expected. Speed modes, headless mode, flips, all worked as expected. I have over 30 years experience in the r/c hobby and have worked for a large networking company. Thus I do not use the wifi controls and video feed. Video over wifi has lag and you can not reliably fly FPV over wifi. I recommend this quadcopter for someone wanting to try flying a quadcopter line of sight. The app is separate from the drone and your mileage may vary with the app.
customer_reviews.author: rcdude07

customer_reviews.title: It's a Winner
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my 9 year old son. At first this drone was all over the place in his hands.Even flawn in the highway in the grass. It got away from him but, we got it and keep flying now he is acting like a Pro. He is happy. Great purchase. Battery life could be a bit better. But he ain't complaining. Thanx again for y'all's reviews, I count on them.
customer_reviews.author: Nothin w/o Jesus

customer_reviews.title: Garbage. Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: Complete garbage. I bought this and used 3 or 4 times. It initially started to fly, but then took off on it's own and got stuck in multiple trees. At first I thought it was just me but the thing has a mind of it's own. The images were also looked like it was taken on a 20 year old camera. I returned it and bought one of the $450 drones from the big named company and have had ZERO issues. Hasn't been stuck yet. Save your money and splurge for the better drone.
customer_reviews.author: RWT

customer_reviews.title: Controller Does Not Sync, only works with app HELP.
customer_reviews.text: Edit: After returning and ordering a replacement i couldnt be happier with this drone. so far been unable to get a hold of anyone with customer support. i'm able to fly the drone with my phone tho the controls are iffy but the remote it came wit fails to work. i've attempted ensuring the drones battery is full, replacing the remotes batterys, going out getting new batterys and trying again all with no luck. id really just like a working controller. if anyone happens to know whats going on id appreciate any help. Again Flys fine with app. Honestly for the price its not bad. Just using a touch screen to fly it is harder than i thought.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Cleghorn

customer_reviews.title: Easy to control in headless feature, average battery life!
customer_reviews.text: I am just a beginner and this is my first drone I ever own. One thing I like in this drone is headless feature. This makes drone so easy to control and balance. The battery life is average(5 6 minutes) and the picture quality is not HD, but it is not that bad either. This outer body seems to have good quality and looks durable. And also, thanks to the rotator protectors, I havent damaged any rotators so far(2 extra rotators comes with the package). The 3D flip is also really cool. Overall, I am satisfied by the drone being a beginner because it is really easy to control and 3d flip is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Ace Ess

customer_reviews.title: My husband was thrilled
customer_reviews.text: My husband has been talking about drones for months and got his first little mini a few weeks ago and fell in love with it although it didn't do much. I surprised him with this and he is thrilled. I read the reviews on it being a great starter drone and easy to use and he had it mastered pretty quickly. Very stable the camera seems to be decent. So far money well spent to see him so thrilled. Note you should make sure to also order extra batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen R.

customer_reviews.title: The one key return didn't work
customer_reviews.text: I was very exited to receive the drone today. And I read the manual and understand there is one key return function. But when I fly in my back yard, the drone went into the forest and when I used the one key return, the drone didn't response at all. It just fly away and eventually I lost control and can't find the drone. Only got few minutes of excitement and now I am frustrated. That's why I rate it one star.
customer_reviews.author: llin5

customer_reviews.title: A very nice drone and the FPV works very well
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a good FPV drone, this drone works great. It connects quickly to your phone. The app is easy to use and the drone looks cool and flies nice. It's a very responsive drone and flies well. I flew it on very windy days and it performed very well. The Field of View in your VR googles is narrow so if you fly it FPV you will want to use a large area. I enjoy this drone. It takes nice video and photo that stream through your phone. The lights are bright and look great at night too. I like this drone a lot. It's easy to fly and fun.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy D

customer_reviews.title: OVER ALL GREAT PRODUCT!!!
customer_reviews.text: This came damaged... The camera never accepted an SD card... It was always broken. I just kept it anyway because it's such a GREAT device... The trim never really adjusted either, I simply compensated it. It's really fun and easy to use, however the battery life could use improvement. I really like this device. So much, a female friend stole my batteries and remote. Now, I'm here with only the drone until I can afford a new one. I'm strongly considering buying this one again. However, I think this one has gotten me ready to upgrade. We'll see... Feel free to ask any questions in the future... Thanx... Over all GREAT PRODUCT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel Brown

customer_reviews.title: Flight time is fine (about 10 mins) and the drone is super light
customer_reviews.text: This drone is exactly how people described it on the reviews as a beginners drone. Flight time is fine (about 10 mins) and the drone is super light. I live in San Francisco so it is pretty windy but when there is no wind it flies very steadily. Happy to own my first inexpensive drone.
customer_reviews.author: Esteban Cheng

customer_reviews.title: Great precision indoor and great range outdoor.
customer_reviews.text: Very good experience. I had expensive drone earlier and when i compare it with this drone, I regret not buying this earlier. It has everything what an expensive drone could have but with very low price. Best for beginners or with kids.
customer_reviews.author: A. Paul

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt fly right
customer_reviews.text: Doesnt fly right and the app doesnt work right, I have a Samsung galexy s9 so there should be no issues with connecting on our ends. Checked all the settings to make sure it wasnt on a bad setting and nothing helped.
customer_reviews.author: Sadie heaps

customer_reviews.title: Buy this drone!!
customer_reviews.text: For $50 this drone surpassed my expectations. I didn’t expect much for a $50 drone but i was very pleased with this. It was super easy to learn, control, and take pictures with. I wish the battery lasted longer but I bought extra to replace throughout a flying session. This drone has taken many falls and beatings so far and it still works great, I am surprised how durable and Quality this drone is. Love how this drone has a feature to do easy flips also!
customer_reviews.author: michael depetris

customer_reviews.title: Has nice features
customer_reviews.text: I am still learning how to fly it good but it is fun. I bought it to take business pictures in the forest and so far has been great. Easy to connect to phone. Has a nice function where it takes off with a button so makes it easier. It isn't a DJ drone but great for price.
customer_reviews.author: McKele Frost

customer_reviews.title: Better than it's more expensive brother.
customer_reviews.text: What I like: -More responsive doing flips and turns than the other LBLA that I own. -Longer fly time than other's I've owned in this price Range. -Has really cool light patterns. What I don't -Have to use button for initial take off. -Takes time to BIND -The internal battery wire compartment is too much effort to recharge. - Flies Louder than other LBLA of the same size.
customer_reviews.author: Ace

customer_reviews.title: great to learn on
customer_reviews.text: I fly rc ,s for many years,,, this little quad , is easy to use ,,, responds great ,,, went up out of sight .. returned with out a challenge .. is not a full g p s , return ,, keep on toe's ..run time is 6 to 8 min,, charge time is 10 min ,,, to 6 min ,,, but hay it,s a toy ,, nothing like my big birds
customer_reviews.author: mark d woods

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: This drone is very spectacular for what it is. It's an extreme budget drone . Best of all it's easy to learn with its huge remote control with many features built into it. I'm very surprised on how long the battery can last. It also charged us up pretty fast. They included corner protectors are also really neet
customer_reviews.author: AWSTECH

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for first time drone owners!
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to assemble - my 4 year old did almost all of it (I had to help with some of the screws) and simple to fly. The camera captured our maiden voyage flawlessly and both my husband and I caught on maneuvering it quickly. It's FUN to fly and easy to control once you get the hang of it. I am planning to take it to a park to test out in a larger area soon - looking forward to all the new videos from above I'll capture!
customer_reviews.author: Auroralvr

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and use. Durable
customer_reviews.text: You will love this Drone because its convenient shape and ease of use and install. It uses the small safe aluminum battery inside the drone so everytime after using, you just need to release it and charge. Good manual is included as it's to read and understand.
customer_reviews.author: Anh Vo

customer_reviews.title: This drone flew away...
customer_reviews.text: On the first day of use this drone up and flew away - and we haven't been able to find it. It would not respond to any of the controls from the remote, including the auto-return button. I emailed the seller asking for a replacement. I'll be happy to update my review if they are helpful. UPDATE - We contacted the seller and they promptly sent us a replacement drone without any hassle. That was very much appreciated. We're still getting a feel for how this drone operates. It feels sluggish in responding to the controller, but we're still getting used to it. If our experience improves, I'll update this review again. LBLA - Thanks for the great support!
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I cannot really rate this product because we have not used it yet as soon as I we do I will be knowledgeable and be able to give an accurate review but as far as we can tell the materials very well the planes very well made easy to set up we'll continue this review a later time
customer_reviews.author: Marisol Luna

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners and excellent price.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my husband. Much nicer than we expected. Large and sturdy. After assembling which was a little difficult as the screws are tiny, it was ready to go. Charged for an hour and took off. Next he needs to try the camera.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Kovacina

customer_reviews.title: This one is junk!
customer_reviews.text: Does not take off with throttle. Best to buy a kite! No stars....
customer_reviews.author: K. GRAY

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup and installation
customer_reviews.text: It is totally worth the money, I had much expensive drone in past but this drone is really good compared to it and the price is the really low. It came with good instruction book and it works really good. Now I have this drone to play with on weekends (also on weekdays) so basically everyday lol.
customer_reviews.author: anirudh

customer_reviews.title: I have really enjoyed flying this drone
customer_reviews.text: Had this drone for a month trouble free. I am retired and took up a hobby with drones. I have really enjoyed flying this drone. This is my first drone and it is a easy flyer. My daughter bought me another brand drone aswell , it requires more flying skills than the LBLA Drone. Will recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: juice22

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: This was my first experience of flying a drone and I am not disappointed with this one. It is small lightweight and easy to operate. I was a bit confused for the first few minutes. I actually dropped it from a height coz I didn’t know how to make a landing. Luckily nothing happened. And the cameras are also fine. I would recommend it to someone who is new in drones.
customer_reviews.author: Nibar

customer_reviews.title: Great drone
customer_reviews.text: Its a good quality drone very easy to control and very fast. The camera is also a good quality one which will surprise the photographers. I highly recommend this drone.
customer_reviews.author: David Marin Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Easy and responsive.
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting to try flying a drone for a while. For the price, this seems well equipped. The assembly is easy, just 8 screws and a couple of battery connections. It is really responsive. I was able to get it to take off and hover in place in a few minutes. And the app works well for first person viewing. All in all a solid product.
customer_reviews.author: R Shain

customer_reviews.title: Simple to get flying
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice entry level drone flys easy and wifi application works good I also like the non slip gimbel sticks on the radio and the one button lunch is nice perfect for the money
customer_reviews.author: Brent cover

customer_reviews.title: I love this drone
customer_reviews.text: I love this drone! It's easy to fly, very lightweight, the camera pretty good and it's add a lot to the product. I like the fact that the propellers protect with pieces of plastic. I recommend this drone for beginners because of his cheap price.
customer_reviews.author: zach marciano

customer_reviews.title: Impressive for the price
customer_reviews.text: We are having a lot of fun with these. Great to see the youngsters have to work a bit to figure it out. Directions not the best, and battery life so small you may want to buy more batteries to have on hand. Sturdy and holds up well on those accidental crash landings. Very impressive, for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kittly

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! So much fun :)
customer_reviews.text: This drone is great! So much have. I have played with it for several days and so far no issues and it's durable. Easy to operate and great for a beginner drone. Takes pictures and videos and can do cool flips! Battery lasts as advertised and everything works as it should. Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Light weight with good camera
customer_reviews.text: This drone is very light weight , has very good camera quality i was not expecting that in night light also it will give good pictures.see attachments Battery life , i was able to use it continuously for 5 min , it may go more than that depending how much battery is charged. Easy to connect to phone and also very easy to operate. Happy with buy and price
customer_reviews.author: SkitMania

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price. Work great too
customer_reviews.text: First is great for the price. The drone is easy to use it also have a camera. Now my husband and kids spend time outside together.And it strong and durable because thy keep landing it on a hard concrete. It still works great.
customer_reviews.author: ogechi Davis

customer_reviews.title: No go
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't get to set level. Kept trying to adjust it. Just didn't work right
customer_reviews.author: scott

customer_reviews.title: Great value for beginners!
customer_reviews.text: I recommend to use the manual look up the videos to build and control the drone! This drone has a great quality for its price!! The first time I took it outside it was windy and I was a bit unsure on how to work it. I flew the drone toward me and my company. After that I got it stuck on a tree. The drone is still working after all of that. Really happy I invested on this drone first before I purchased something more pricey
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: it was great!! It is very durable
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my husband for his birthday and he loves it! It took him a little while to get used to telling which direction the drone was moving but once he got it down, it was great!! It is very durable, as he had a few mishaps in the learning stage and it's still kicking!!
customer_reviews.author: Jordon Headley

customer_reviews.title: Unresponsive drone
customer_reviews.text: After one day of getting accustomed to the movements of the drone, and being able to watch through my phone during flight, the unthinkable happened,while in flight I was unable to call it back or stop it ,can’t say if it’s possible for a random frequency to take control but I would make a suggestion be sure to attach a name and number.
customer_reviews.author: harper donahue iii

customer_reviews.title: i really like the look & when it flies it flies great
customer_reviews.text: i really like the look & when it flies it flies great! the app is in Chinese. & i cant read or tell how to translate on a k indle fire
customer_reviews.author: stalliono space race

customer_reviews.title: Very good drone I ever had for this price.
customer_reviews.text: God drone. It’s very powerful and easy to learn and fly. I like this drone because of altitude hold. It hold in perfect and perfectly done. No complain.
customer_reviews.author: Raj

customer_reviews.title: Overall, for the money 5 stars!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good drone for the price point. Not sure how it will last over time. But very good so far. Great for someone starting out. See if you like the hobbie and upgrade in the future if you do. Or good for a kid you don’t want to buy a very expensive drone for. Overall, for the money, 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: tarin benhudjiriras

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is my first drone and I can say it is very good for the money. I suggest getting some better batteries and enjoy
customer_reviews.author: Chris Thrasher

customer_reviews.title: Adult kid loves it.
customer_reviews.text: It's what he wanted. He was excited to receive it. He got in one play session. He came back and made a list of what he loves and challenges. Bad weather has kept him grounded.
customer_reviews.author: IslandFaves

customer_reviews.title: Great price for the size
customer_reviews.text: Easy and quick to get up and flying. This is a cool looking drone that is perfect to start off stepping up in size, about a foot in size. I am having a lot of fun with this.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Lynn

customer_reviews.title: For the money, this Drone is really good
customer_reviews.text: Bought this drone for my son for Christmas. Once he learned how to use it he played with it off and on all day. The battery isn't super great and that's the only complaint. We haven't figured out how to use the app yet or the video unit. It's not very intuitive, but we'll learn eventually. I recommend this for the money and for less experienced users.
customer_reviews.author: Shelba

customer_reviews.title: Not much flying time
customer_reviews.text: It was a great price. But I was disappointed that it only lasts 15 minutes efore needing to be charged. It also didn't seem to be high quality plastic. Would go with a more expensive version next time.
customer_reviews.author: Artsy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome drone
customer_reviews.text: This is my first drone and its been a lot of fun. Im using it to practice for when Im a professional surveyor using a real drone. I would recommend this to anyone who wants to get into drone flying because of its fair price. Camera looks nice and is fun to make homemade videos with.
customer_reviews.author: Clam

customer_reviews.title: good for a beginner
customer_reviews.text: well first it light weight as describe, easy to carry with you when you travel. and the it was easy to handle(must read before you fly if first-time user), i have to say the blades are plastic but still shape when rotating. the highest i can do is about 4 meters because i don't have enough wide and open space to fly higher. if new users wanna start a explore with drone, this drone was a good choice.
customer_reviews.author: KingTiger

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my son and he lives it. Everything works easy to use and set up. You do have to use your own cell phone with it if you want to view scenery. I didnt read that before purchasing but its cool.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Reed

customer_reviews.title: she loved it!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this Drone as a gift to my friend’s daughter,she loved it!! Easy to manage and very good quality for the camera!! Very Good product for the price paid!
customer_reviews.author: Taha raul

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. The 2nd one I ordered in 2 weeks. Great for first time drone lik
customer_reviews.author: Jim Griggs

customer_reviews.title: the trim presets arent any good
customer_reviews.text: what a great beginner but needs work to adjust the trim. the presets for the trim is way off. my drone is mostly flying in reverse not able to level out. HOVER
customer_reviews.author: jamesfarrell

customer_reviews.title: A good drone
customer_reviews.text: I am using it just for fun, but it is also really useful for Photos and Videos from Air. The driving pleasure with this model, as well as the ease of operation convinced me good. The drone response quickly to the movement and I liked the quality of pictures
customer_reviews.author: Oguzcan Cig

customer_reviews.title: Good gift for kids but nothing past that
customer_reviews.text: Battery doesn’t last long. I’ve bought better ones at Marshall’s for a similar price. It works for beginners for a gift but besides that I wouldn’t recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: GIFT FOR XMAS
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS A GIFT FOR MY GRANDSON..I KNOW HE WILL BE EXCITED WHEN HE OPENS IT FOR XMAS!
customer_reviews.author: Belinda B.

customer_reviews.title: No battery included? Broken landing skid.
customer_reviews.text: Did not come with a battery for the drone. Arrived with a broken landing skid. No replacements and can’t use the drone as intended with only one working landing skid.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Reeves

customer_reviews.title: Good Luck
customer_reviews.text: Did even get to charge it properly and train myself and it quit working. That was within 48hrs and my doing extensive research on how to operate it prior to purchasing. I returned it within 48 hrs.
customer_reviews.author: Graven

customer_reviews.title: Works good for little kids
customer_reviews.text: My kids love it! You can tell it’s cheaply made some pieces have already broke off but they do give you some spare parts! Can’t really figure out the remote and the camera I have downloaded the app on my iPhone and it has yet to work or I just can’t figure it out 🤷🏼‍♀️ It works great for little kids!!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Norris

customer_reviews.title: Solid Build
customer_reviews.text: As a drone owner of 24others, I must comment on adjustable camera angle to suit your need.....clear picture and video performance considering the great price point. Easy to setup and use.....recommend buy !
customer_reviews.author: Andy.   Ontario

customer_reviews.title: Very Fun to flight
customer_reviews.text: Very interesting and fun to flight with. The remote control is very lightweight. It is great to have a camera on it. However, the battery drains a little fast. The camera resolution is little low, but for such a low price drone, it is very good to start with and learn the control.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: High durability
customer_reviews.text: It’s easy to be controlled with some practice at the beginning It’s sooo light but with high durability Good quality photos too
customer_reviews.author: Ehab Sayed

customer_reviews.title: Good flyer
customer_reviews.text: Good light weight flyer for beginners to start this flying hobby before moving to DJIs. Cool gift for any kid this holiday season. Pros: Wifi Live streaming 720p camera - not sure if this hd LED lights - good in low light flying though not advised. Good battery Cons: Wifi streaming can lag Can be tricky in strong winds
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Half the parts are missing!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't flown it yet. I have to charge the battery. The phone holder was missing! The screws to hold in the prop guards are missing! The charge cable is missing! The screwdriver is missing! The 2 extra blades are missing! I understand that this was a fairly cheap drone but had I known half the parts would be missing I may have mad a different choice.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Haynes

customer_reviews.title: My son likes it so much
customer_reviews.text: It’s above my expectations. I liked it so much, it’s stable and very cost effective. It lasts for around 10 minutes until you have to recharge it.
customer_reviews.author: Ali Ibrahim

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing
customer_reviews.text: This drone was supposed to be “the best bang for the buck”. It’s no better than other drones that are the same price. Return to home doesn’t work, video quality and connection is poor, and has lots of trouble flying in the slightest breeze. Is it worth the 50 bucks? Yes. Is it the best bang for the buck? I don’t think so.
customer_reviews.author: M. Gann

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality. Didn’t last a month. My son is experienced RC device “pilot”. This drone fell apart within a week. Landing gear was falling off in the air. Once going faster device would shake, go down and skid. Remote control would not communicate with the device.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: I have to say you definitely get what you pay for. It's not a multiple hundred dollar drone and it doesnt fly like one, but it's definitely not a ten dollar toy either, being my first drone about 20 dollars I have to say I am impressed, the only thing I would suggest as a improvement is longer battery life. As well as a way to edit and send the videos you take. But all in all it's pretty good, I would say it's worth the $50
customer_reviews.author: Bradley C.

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Drone
customer_reviews.text: I loved how easy it was to set the phone app up and control it via my phone it made it seem like a very high end drone. Drone flys great and remote controls works amazing! I would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Evan Spoelstra

customer_reviews.title: Pretty darn good
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Only flew it once, about 15 min. Need to buy more batteries. It takes a lickin’ And keeps on tickin’
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Not the greatest
customer_reviews.text: The range is very short and the wind will carry it away in seconds, the camera is horrible, and the drone does not hover. My drone is currently on my neighbors roof after pressing the one key return button (it didn’t work).Basicly don’t buy It.
customer_reviews.author: Jejdjd

customer_reviews.title: Good beginner drone
customer_reviews.text: I bought to me and my father enjoy flying them only downside batteries last 7-10 minutes had to buy extra batteries
customer_reviews.author: LackNone

customer_reviews.title: Good and durable !
customer_reviews.text: This drone is very well built and durable. It flies pretty high and goes fast. Great purchase
customer_reviews.author: Paulina

customer_reviews.title: The battery does not long enough.
customer_reviews.text: The battery life is not quite perfect. Just 10 minutes flying. It is easy to control. It has a high definition camera.
customer_reviews.author: The journalists

customer_reviews.title: Not recomended ..
customer_reviews.text: Battery 🔋 is usless, you can used only 6 minutes and need to charge again 😫
customer_reviews.author: Jessica S.

customer_reviews.title: Easy navigation
customer_reviews.text: Aside from short battery life, overall decent system. Easy to fly, controls work flawlessly. Decent for beginners .
customer_reviews.author: Дмитрий Литвинов

customer_reviews.title: Fun, cool
customer_reviews.text: This drone was so much fun. My nephew was obsessed with it and I couldn’t get him to put it down. If the child is too young, definitely have an adult to help them get it going. Maybe she 10 and up?
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Woodside

customer_reviews.title: Meets expectations.
customer_reviews.text: This is great for beginners. It will drift with a slight breeze and into a neighbor's yard but my son likes it! Image quality is decent. It is a good drone for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl Latty

customer_reviews.title: Much More value than I assumed would be there.
customer_reviews.text: Very fun, I’m impressed with the value. I’m also impressed with how far technology has come since I’ve been living under this rock here. I wouldn’t expect much of the video, but for the price it’s awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Fun yet bad
customer_reviews.text: Lots of fun but I only give it 2 stars because it easily loses connection when flown about 100 to 125 feet. Amazing fun when flown close to the ground but when I tested to see how high it would fly, I lost all control and it drifted off it's own way. Good thing is the emergency stop that thankfully still worked and dropped it to the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: Just got drone. Nice toy ) wanna to mount my gopro for better quality video. Comes with remote and phone holder. Easy to assemble and operate.
customer_reviews.author: ravshan

customer_reviews.title: Great drone for beginners
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time usinga drone and it was remarkable to fly it in the parks. The camera quality is fine and real fun to fly the drone in a 360° angle. Recommend for first time drone users.
customer_reviews.author: Dhruvil Shah

customer_reviews.title: Super reliable and works as expected.
customer_reviews.text: The drone is very fast and reliable. I love how long the battery lasts on it compared to a different drone I used to own which was more expensive and ran out of battery quicker. I flew it super high and I love the different crazy flips it can do. Camera is also not bad for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Alan S

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Drone is great for the price. Very easy to use, highly recommended. Picture quality is decent for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Javin Ho

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this drone.
customer_reviews.text: If I could give less than one star I would. On the first flight the drone took off and was uncontrollable and lost. I followed the mediocre at best directions, yet the drone acted as if it had a mind of its own. I deserve every last penny of my money back.
customer_reviews.author: abbey callahan

customer_reviews.title: Wish it had a Home button
customer_reviews.text: I brought this to practice on and get used to flying a drone. Set-up was easy, take off was great, but i had a hard time bring it back, I ended up losing it.
customer_reviews.author: marcos

customer_reviews.title: First drone worthy, easy and fast, entertaining
customer_reviews.text: Battery dies way faster than I’d like but everything works perfectly flies as expected the tricks are amazing and it’s well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Kolander

customer_reviews.title: Great drone
customer_reviews.text: The whole package is considerate: has the drone, blades, controller, designed app, the obstacle protector. Easy to assemble the drone and use the app. Satisfied with the look and the performance of the drone. It takes time to read the booklet and practice for sure.
customer_reviews.author: HanboLiu

customer_reviews.title: Good but disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Great Drone! Really great! But disappointed cause the phone holder broke just trying to rotate it right! The kid was really sad. But really nice and fun drone
customer_reviews.author: Cherifa

customer_reviews.title: Received defective
customer_reviews.text: One of the legs is broken and is missing where the screw would go. Screwed up in manufacturing is what it looks like. Also was short a screw.
customer_reviews.author: E Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Nice Drone with a nice camera
customer_reviews.text: This drone exceeded my expectations. I'm impressed with the camera on this drone. Handles real nice. Definitely read the instructions if you've never flown a drone before.
customer_reviews.author: Erwin Godoy

customer_reviews.title: Upset
customer_reviews.text: Sux lost it in 10 mins it flew away from me an kept going till stuck in tree!!
customer_reviews.author: Rob B

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: My grandkids loved the drone but i suggest a bigger or longer battery life
customer_reviews.author: Ayodele Bryant

product_meta.title: LBLA FPV Drone with WiFi Camera Live Video Headless Mode 2.4Ghz 4 Ch 6 Axis Gyro RTF RC Quadcopter, Compatible with 3D VR Headset, Black
feature_bullets: Equipped with 480P HD camera to take aerial photos and video. Images and videos was streaming to phone over Wi-Fi
Thanks to altitude hold function, The drone will keep hovering at the current height once the throttle was released
Headless mode certainly makes things easier for beginners
Control the drone with the remote control, Wi-Fi pairing with the phone app, or a combination of both for a real-time video transmission of the drones flight
The one-key return feature of this drone ensures you never have to worry about losing this drone. Wherever you are flying, hit the one-key return button and it will return straight to you

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars502 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
